ref.mixed-citation: The Standard Edition of the Complete Psychological Works of Sigmund Freud, translated by James Strachey, 24 vols (London, Hogarth Press, 1:953-73), VII, 16-18.

The Wolf-Man by the Wolf-Man, edited by Muriel Gardiner (New York, Basic Books, 1971), p. 146.
Holmes and Freud, see my Reading for the Plot (New York and Oxford, Knopf and Oxford University Press, 1984), pp. 269 ff.

Ross Chambers, Story and Situation (Minneapolis, University of Minnesota Press, 1984).

Gérard Genette, Narrative Discourse (translation of 'Discours du récit', in Figures III) (Ithaca, Cornell University Press, 1980).

Balzac, Autre étude de femme, in La Comédie humaine, III, p. 675.
